data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lis, Jerzy A., Lis, Barbara, Ziaja, Dariusz J., Dobosz, Roland (2014): Description and DNA barcoding of Ochetostethomorpha secunda, a new species of the South African endemic burrower bug genus (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Cydnidae) from Namibia. Zootaxa 3884 (6): 561-566, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3884.6.4
